job.title: Software Engineer, Machine Learning
job.description: at lyft our mission is to improve peoples lives with the worlds best transportation to do this we start with our own community by creating an open inclusive and diverse organizationltbrgtltbrgtdata and machine learning are at the heart of lyfts products and decisionmaking as a member of the data science and machine learning team you will work in a dynamic environment where we embrace moving quickly to build the worlds best transportation machine learning engineers build algorithms that make our internal and external products responsive personalized and powerful were looking for passionate driven engineers to take on some of the most interesting and impactful problems in ridesharingltbrgtltbrgtas a machine learning engineer you will be developing and implementing mathematical models underpinning the platforms core services compared to other technology companies of a similar size the set of problems that we tackle is incredibly diverse they cut across optimization personalization adaptive modeling transportation and mapping we are hiring motivated experts in each of these fields were looking for someone who is passionate about solving problems with data building reliable machine learning systems and are excited about working in a fastpaced innovative and collegial environmentltbrgtltbrgtyou will report to a software engineering machine learning managerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtpartner with backend and front end engineers data scientist product managers and business partners to frame machine learning applications both theoretically and within the business contextltligtltligtperform exploratory data analysis to gain a deeper understanding of the problemltligtltligtdevelop statistical machine learning or optimization modelsltligtltligtwrite production quality code to implement machine learning models at scaleltligtltligtevaluate machine learning systems against business goalsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtexperienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbs ms or phd in statistics operations research mathematics computer science or other quantitative fields or related work experienceltligtltligtpassion for building impactful machine learning models leveraging expertise in one or multiple fieldsltligtltligtproficiency with python and linux based development environments ltligtltligtstrong communicatorltligtltligtstrong understanding of machine learning methodologies and their applicationsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtbenefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtgreat medical dental and vision insurance optionsltligtltligtmental health benefitsltligtltligtin addition to observed holidays salaried team members have unlimited paid time off hourly team members have days paid time offltligtltligtk plan to help save for your futureltligtltligt weeks of paid parental leave biological adoptive and foster parents are all eligibleltligtltligtpretax commuter benefitsltligtltligtlyft pink lyft team members get an exclusive opportunity to test new benefits of our ridership programltbrgtltligtltulgtltemgtlyft is an equal opportunityaffirmative action employer committed to an inclusive and diverse workplace all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regards to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability status protected veteran status or any other basis prohibited by law we also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories consistent with applicable federal state and local lawltemgt
